sentences.cn: 包括职业和业余选手参加的高尔夫球锦标赛

sentences.en: England are brimming with confidence after two straight wins in the tournament.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队在锦标赛中连赢两场后信心大增。

sentences.en: He defaulted in the wrestling tournament.
sentences.cn: 他在摔跤比赛中弃权了.

sentences.en: He was the best boxer in the tournament.
sentences.cn: 他是本届联赛的最佳拳手.

sentences.en: I feel I can win this tournament.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我能打赢这次锦标赛。

sentences.en: It's no use egging him on; he's made up his mind not to join in the tournament.
sentences.cn: 他已拿定主意不参加比赛了，你再将他也没有用。

sentences.en: Lopez breezed into the quarter-finals of the tournament.
sentences.cn: 洛佩斯轻松打入了锦标赛的四分之一决赛。

sentences.en: She had been videoing the highlights of the tournament.
sentences.cn: 她一直在制作锦标赛集锦的录像。

sentences.en: She is aching to join in the tournament.
The Council resolved that the next tournament should be held in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 理事会决定下次比赛在上海举行.

sentences.en: the eventual winner of the tournament
the knockout stages of the tournament
The last golf tournament of the European season is building up to a dramatic climax.
sentences.cn: 欧洲赛季的最后一场高尔夫球锦标赛就要迎来最激动人心的时刻。

sentences.en: The tournament is open to both amateurs and professionals.
sentences.cn: 这次锦标赛业余选手和职业选手均可参加。
那场锦标赛组织得很出色。

sentences.en: They default ed in the badminton tournament.
sentences.cn: 在羽毛球锦标赛中他们没出场.

sentences.en: They dropped two games in a row and were eliminated from the tournament.
sentences.cn: 他们在划船比赛中输了两场比赛，并被淘汰出局。

sentences.en: We produced the best soccer of the tournament. Nobody would argue with that.
sentences.cn: 本届比赛中我们踢出了最漂亮的足球，谁都不会否认这一点。

trans.tran_en: a competition in which players compete against each other in a series of games until there is one winner
